headline.main: Lady Workers Wanted; WANTED: WOMEN IN WAR INDUSTRY. By Laura Nelson Baker. 215 pp. New York: E.P. Dutton & Co. $2.50.

lead_paragraph: " MISS AMERICA" of 1943 wears no bathing suit, but coveralls and goggles. She is found four million strong in the war plants of the nation. Six million more of her are wanted before the end of the year. Arsenals, aircraft plants and shipyards hunger for the feminine touch that has proved so telling in creating weapons of war.
abstract: Baker, N N; Wanted: Women in War Industry
